short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to remove mental load when working with pull requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maintains a list of GitHub pull request which need action, such as review or merging. This removes mental load and decreases the amount of time between reviews.
